page.title: 15TRAVEL TO SCHOOL
page.content: Most people live in Bishop's Stortford, although there are many living in the local villages. Most people travel to school by bus or coach. Several people travel by car, a couple from Essex travel by train for part of their journey. In my form of 34 children their home settlements were: *Bishops Stortford (17) *Thorley (3) *Bury Green (2) *Harlow (1) *Hunsdon (1) *Elsenham (1) *Albury (1) *Berden (1) *Standon (1) *Henham (1) *Much Hadham (1) *Furneux Pelham (1) *Stansted Mountfitchett (1) *Farnham (1) *Hadham Hall (1) There is a good deal of choice in Education with 2 Girl's, 1 Boy's, 2 Mixed and a Catholic School in the local area. There are also private schools. Based on a survey by Lisa Cook 1H.
